articles.description: The government is betting the house on ramping up its vaccination programme
articles.content: England has gone into a tough lockdown to halt spiralling COVID-19 hospitalisations and relieve pressure on its health system. The prime minister, Boris Johnson, has said the new lockdown will last a… [+5483 chars]
